rows.label: tev016201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev016201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Gigio about Noctilum.

rows.label: tev016201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev016201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Gigio about recent developments.

rows.label: tev016201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Gigio about his work as an Outfitter.

rows.label: tev016201_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Gigio about recent developments.

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0001
rows.name:
I sensed the presence of a strange lifeform when
I was sleeping at a camp in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0002
rows.name:
I wanted to observe it longer, so I pretended I was
asleep in my tent. But then I heard a voice speaking
softly in English.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0003
rows.name:
The only words I could make out were "meat,"
"unappetizing," "wallet," and "steal."
...Which is weird, right? Really weird.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Anyway, I freaked out and yelled at everyone to
prepare for combat, which made the creature run off
into the brush. I still have no idea what the hell it was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0010
rows.name: I've accepted another weapon-testing job from Isobe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0011
rows.name:
The weapon is incredibly powerful, but easy to use
and quite practical for fieldwork![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0012
rows.name:
It's really an excellent piece. I feel like I'm the
luckiest Outfitter in BLADE for getting to test it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0013
rows.name:
I'd hate to miss another opportunity to accept a
mission from a great weapons developer like Isobe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0014
rows.name:
So I've got to make sure I select jobs that won't leave
me repeating my failure in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0020
rows.name:
Now in addition to Sakuraba, Grenada, and Meredith,
we have the Nopon Commerce Guild and Candid &
Credibleâ€”two xenoform arms manufacturers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0021
rows.name:
I wonder if they'll all want us to conduct prototype
weapon tests like the kind you helped with earlier?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0022
rows.name:
If so, that won't be easy. That's an awful lot of
companies to serve, after all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0023
rows.name:
Recently, we had a mission to escort merchants from
the Nopon Commerce Guild to Sylvalum. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0024
rows.name:
But as soon as the little buggers saw anything of value,
they ditched their escorts and went running after it.
Which made it really hard to actually PROTECT them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0030
rows.name:
Jajanni from Candid & Credible entrusted me with a
new prototype weapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0031
rows.name:
That thing is no joke. I took down a rampaging simius
in a single shot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0032
rows.name:
I'd heard about the technological prowess of the
Ma-non, but firing that gun let me really feel it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016201_MSG0033
rows.name:
Whether it's Jajanni or Isobe from Sakuraba,
this city is lucky to have access to such truly
gifted inventors.[ST:wait ]
